TitleEnglish: Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf 2
SummaryEnglish: The arrival of the aggressive invader has changed the goat village into a playground. The goats are forced to become working staff in the playground, even the wolf family too. That change has made Green grassland not green anymore. For the future of Green grassland, Weslie and Wolffy have to work together and find a way to beat the invader and save the grassland.
